member.name: ITfStatusSink.OnStatusChange
member.summary: Receives a notification when one of the dynamic flags of the TF_STATUS structure changes.
member.param: Pointer to the interface whose status has changed.
Indicates that one of the dynamic flags changed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfStatusSink
member.summary: The ITfStatusSink interface supports changes to the global document status. This advise sink is installed by calling with IID_ITfStatusSink. A text service can optionally implement this interface.
